mapper.select: SELECT CON_DIV, CON_NO, CON_TITLE, CON_TXT, CON_ID, PASSWORD, READ_COUNT, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as REG_DATE, UPD_DATE FROM CONTENTS_DATA WHERE CON_DIV = #{con_div} AND DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY ABS(CON_NO) DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONTENTS_DATA (CON_DIV, CON_NO, CON_TITLE, CON_TXT, CON_ID, PASSWORD, REG_IP) VALUES (#{con_div}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(ABS(CON_NO))+1,1) FROM CONTENTS_DATA), #{con_title}, #{con_txt}, #{con_id}, #{password}, #{reg_ip})
